title: Takeover our lease! 3 bed 2 bath apartment in Renton
posting_body: Looking for a 3 bedroom, 2 bath apartment with washer and dryer in unit?
We just recently purchased a house and are looking for someone to take over our lease.
Swimming Pool area with grill for Barbecuing?
Plus, valet trash service every night so you dont need to take trash out to the dumpster.
No security deposit (we paid it and are leaving it behind for you!).
Simply take over the lease on September 1st.
Your move in date is September 1st!
After you apply at the main office and take over the lease, it's all yours!
Our lease is signed until May 2023.
We have 1 carport parking and lots of free parking available around the apartment complex.
This location is near 405 and 5 freeways and 20 mins to the Southcenter mall.
Walking distance to Fred meyer and 5 mins away from Uwajimaya.
Copy and paste the link below to view our apartment's website and amenities!
